(3) The host gives a quick graphene overview and asks if fighter jet coatings make jets undetectable by radar. (4) A lower-third reads “TRacy Weslosky - CEO InvestorIntel Corp.” as she asks for the most exciting graphene application. (5) The lower-third switches to “DR. IAN FLINT - SENIOR EDITOR @Investor_Intel” as he answers with water filters and desalination. (6) Dr. Flint replies “short answer yes, long answer no” about radar stealth and confirms the military doesn't use such coatings. (1) The host pivots to the topic of “space elevators.”

Therefore, the correct order is: 2 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6 -> 1

The correct timeline is: 1 -> 2 -> 4 -> 3 -> 5 -> 6 -> 7 -> 8
Therefore, the answer is A.
